variants.Description in input context: This variant alters a conserved region of the protein and is predicted to be damaging.
This variant is predicted to be benign and does not disrupt protein structure.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the SH-SY5Y human neuroblastoma cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: DJ-1 protein levels were reduced by 30% for the variant NM_004025.3:c.298A>G compared to wild-type controls.
DJ-1 protein levels were unchanged for the variant NM_004025.3:c.313C>T compared to wild-type controls.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA with Tukey's post-hoc test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression within 10% of wild-type control levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression >20% lower than wild-type control levels.
